channel.title: can't link my monero wallet to the remote nodes
channel.description: Hi. I have a problem with creating monero wallet on whonix. I don't want to download all monero blockchain and want to use remote nodes, but when i choose this way and try to create a wallet there is a message says monero wallet can't be created. What remote nodes should be used, any instructions? Or maybe i have to do other preparations?

item.title: can't link my monero wallet to the remote nodes
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This question is better asked in Monero support places as per
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle

That is because using Monero inside or outside of Whonix shouldn’t matter wrt to this question.

Read full topic
item.source: can't link my monero wallet to the remote nodes
